<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 1"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Razzle-Dazzle](/Feats.aspx?ID=1417) <actions string="Free Action" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Gnome" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=80" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Advanced Player's Guide](/Sources.aspx?ID=39) pg. 44 <sup>2.0</sup></row>

**Frequency**
once per hour

**Trigger**
You [blind](/Conditions.aspx?ID=1) or [dazzle](/Conditions.aspx?ID=7) a creature.

</column>

---

You've spent considerable time practicing the manipulation of light, weaponizing your blade's reflection or bolstering the luminosity of magical displays to unconventional heights. Extend the duration of the blinded or dazzled condition you give the target by 1 round.
name: Razzle-Dazzle
